title: Surface Surf Watch Face
summary: Surf forecast watch face powered by Magicseaweed

descriptionHTML:
Surf forecast watch face powered by Magicseaweed,

Stay updated with star rating, surf height now, three and six hours later, as well as swell height, swell period, swell direction, wind direction, wind speed and four-day forecast for your favourite surf spots, right on your wrist.

Surf forecasts for selected surf spots around the world. Tell us what surf spots you'd like to see and we'll add them.

To view the four-day forecast, just tap on the watch face.

To select a surf spot, long-press on the watch face, tap on the gear icon, tap on "Select surf spot", then scroll and tap the spot you want to display.

To change the watch face (between diver and aviator designs), toggle date display or toggle digital time display, long-press on the watch face, tap on the gear icon, then scroll and tap to select the design, date on/off or digital on/off option you want.

Simply designed for epic days.

Full list of surf spots you'll find in the app:

comments: Love the watch face. It is awesome having the surf forecast on my wrist. It also looks very stylish on my moto 360. The one feature that would make it PERFECT is if it had the TIDES and maybe water temp. Other than that it is great. I would highly recommend the watch face/app. Best on the market. Great job!
Wonderful app but only 3 stars because it doesnt have tides. Otherwise probably a 4 or 5 star.
I have installed is on my phone but can not find to open it up.
Needs Florida West Coast Wish it could have a couple spots on the Gulf side of Florida. Clearwater or st. Pete. Maybe even throw in Fort Myers, Naples, and Sarasota
Doesn't work on Sony smart watch 3 Really would like this to work but keeps telling me it's stopped running :(
recentChanges: Improved stability. Minor bugfix. All good now.
Fixed a bug that prevented loading of accurate surf data for selected spot. Other minor bugfixes. All good now.
